Description.Text:
Mary's Resort is where Old Florida meets modern luxury. The resort is located just a block from the New River and within walking distance of Downtown Fort Lauderdale. Wilton Manors, the beaches, nightclubs and restaurants are all close by. Your hosts, Mary (a lovable Boston Terrier) and proprietor, Keith welcome you to their pet-friendly resort.

Mary's Resort features four unique, Key West-style structures, each separated by tropical gardens with a central heated swimming pool and Jacuzzi. This extraordinary property has been completely renovated/restored to become a first class, luxurious resort. You'll feel as though you're in a completely secluded oasis when you walk through the door. Please note: Because we are a small boutique property, we are often open with a single staff member. Please contact our office within 24-hours of your expected arrival time. You MUST contact the office in advance to obtain our gate access code. Either call 954-523-3500 Ext. 2, or email to info@marysresort.com. The resort welcomes all guests age 16 and over.

Small pets 25 lbs and under are allowed for a fee of $50. We define a small, well-behaved pet as an animal that doesn't bite or growl at other guests, doesn't chew on furniture or bed linens, and doesn't bark, keeping other guests awake at night, when their parents are out to dinner or at the beach.

Hotel is within one block of the New River and several blocks from Downtown Fort Lauderdale, also very close to Wilton Manors, the beaches, nightclubs and restaurants. Broward Center for the Performing Arts, Antique Car Museum, Billie Swamp Safari, Bonnet House, Butterfly World, Museum of Art, Stranahan House.

Sapodilla House with 2 Queen beds, 1 Queen sofa bed, luxury bath with separate Jacuzzi tub, glass sh - This luxurious house offers 2 queen beds in separate bedrooms with pillow top mattress along with fully equipped stainless steel and granite eat-in kitchen, front deck, private bath with shower and Jacuzzi tub featuring Aveda products, 3 LCD TV's with DVD players, 4 ceiling fans, central air conditioning, 2 CD Player with AM/FM clock radio, iron & ironing board and electronic safe. Complimentary high speed wireless internet provided. Please note: Contact our office within 24-hours of your expected arrival time. You MUST contact the office in advance to obtain our gate access code. Either call 954-523-3500 Ext.2 or email to info@marysresort.com. Royal Palm Room with1 King Bed - This room offers 1 king bed with pillow top mattress, private bath with shower featuring Aveda products, LCD cable TV with DVD player, remote controlled air conditioning, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, CD Player with AM/FM clock radio, iron & ironing board, electronic safe, private deck, Complimentary high speed wireless Internet provided. Please note: Contact our office within 24-hours of your expected arrival time. You MUST contact the office in advance to obtain our gate access code. Either call 954-523-3500 Ext.2 or email to info@marysresort.com. Complimentary high speed wireless Internet provided. Please note: Please note: Contact our office within 24-hours of your expected arrival time. You MUST contact the office in advance to obtain our gate access code. Either call 954-523-3500 Ext.2 or email to info@marysresort.com. Private bath with shower featuring Aveda products. Complimentary high speed wireless Internet provided. Please note: Please note: Contact our office within 24-hours of your expected arrival time. You MUST contact the office in advance to obtain our gate access code. Either call 954-523-3500 Ext.2 or email to info@marysresort.com. You MUST contact the office in advance to obtain our gate access code. Either call 954-523-3500 Ext.2 or email to info@marysresort.com. Private bath with shower featuring Aveda products. Complimentary high speed wireless Internet provided. Please note: Please note: Contact our office within 24-hours of your expected arrival time.
